questions.question: From a scale of 1 to 5, how would you rate the overall quality of the food served to you?
Do you have any feedback or concerns about the taste of the food?
Do you have any feedback or concerns about the presentation of the dishes?
How satisfied were you with the portion sizes of the dishes?
Were there any dishes that stood out to you positively? If yes, please specify.
Were there any dishes that you were disappointed with? If yes, please specify.
How would you rate the cleanliness of the restaurant's dining area?
Do you have any comments or concerns about the restaurant's cleanliness?
How would you rate the attentiveness of the restaurant staff?
Do you have any feedback or concerns about the service provided by the staff?
Did you find the ambiance of the restaurant pleasant?
Were there any aspects of the ambiance that you found lacking? If yes, please specify.
How likely are you to recommend this restaurant to others?
Would you consider dining at this restaurant again in the future?
Do you have any additional comments or suggestions for the restaurant?
